document.full_text: u.s. federal agents encouraged an arizona gun dealer to sell weapons to suspected traffickers for the mexican drug cartels, even after the dealer warned they would end up in the hands of "bad guys," according to correspondence released by a u.s. senator.
document.title: senator says government agency ignored gun warnings
lines_and_colors: u.s. federal agents encouraged an arizona gun dealer to sell weapons to suspected traffickers for the mexican drug cartels, even after the dealer warned they would end up in the hands of "bad guys," according to correspondence released by a u.s. senator.
